channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Max’s Best New Show Lands A Perfect 100% Critic Score
item.description: The best new show to hit Max in a while has arrived with perfect scores from critics, but it may not be for everyone, given its subject matter.

item.title: How AI Can Leverage Digital Clones And Aid Terminally Ill Patients
item.description: In the end, AI-driven digital legacies are about preserving what makes us human.

item.title: Ransomware Snitches Wanted — $250,000 Bounty Offered
item.description: If you have information about ransomware groups, individual criminals, or access brokers, you could earn big money by snitching.

item.title: High School Dropout Launches VibeGrade To Help Teachers Grade Faster
item.description: Vibegrade, a YC-backed startup using AI to help teachers deliver high-quality feedback in their own style, 10x faster, announces its public launch tod...

item.title: Ryan Coogler’s Post-‘Sinners’ Project Sounds Amazing
item.description: The question, obviously, is what Sinner director Ryan Coogler is going to do next, and it’s not a sequel to that movie.

item.title: Good instincts
item.description: Sometimes, in the absence of data or useful experience, we’re left to act on our instincts. It’s worth noting that other people have instincts as well...

item.title: Work ethic vs discipline
item.description: A solid work ethic drives someone to show up, even when they’d rather not. If there’s work on their desk, they’ll take it on. Discipline, on the other...

item.title: The steps vs. the concept
item.description: If you memorize the steps, you have a direct, simple and fast path to obtain the result. Until the world changes. Even the tiniest shift in the system...

item.title: Enrollment and engagement
item.description: Teachers and organizations benefit from both, but they’re not the same. Engagement is the delight we have when we lean into the process. Engagement ha...

item.title: The use (and design) of tools
